name: Domain Tensor Axiom Box
intent: Define D\_ijk... as the canonical, universal carrier of semantic fields.

axioms.statement: Every semantic object in IGSOA admits an embedding into a Domain Tensor D\_ijk... with finite or countable index sets.
All ρ-layers, Θ-polarities, and μ-weights are representable as distinguished indices or index decorations of D\_ijk....
δ, Φ, and Π act as endofunctors or projections on the category of Domain Tensors, preserving well-typed index structures.

invariants: Index sets of D\_ijk... remain well-typed under δ, Φ, Π.
Layer index ρ is always factorizable as a distinguished index of D.
constraints: No semantic object may be declared without specifying its embedding into some D\_ijk....
D\_ijk... may be infinite-dimensional, but each concrete Box must use a finite subdomain.
